Fitted dress in a soft rib knit with a high collar and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft cotton-blend knit with hole-knit details, long raglan sleeves with lacing at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Embroidery on the front and sleeves.
Shorter jumper in a soft, mohair-blend knit with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a sequined pattern, low dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves.
Satin court shoes decorated with sparkly stones. Pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.

Short, lightly padded parka in cotton twill with an embroidered motif at the top, lined hood and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, long sleeves with shaping seams at the elbows and a press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and D-rings. Unlined.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and D-rings. Unlined.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Long sleeves with a tab and D-rings. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a glittery pattern, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button. Zip fly, low crotch and tapered legs.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton with twill hard-worn details and a zip fly and button. Legs with short slits in the sides and raw-edge frayed hems.
Straight-cut shirt in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Wide, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with long, wide sleeves and a gathered seam under the bust. Embroidered pattern and cutwork embroidery around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with long, wide sleeves and a gathered seam under the bust. Embroidered pattern and cutwork embroidery around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, a print motif at the top and short slits in the sides.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short skirt in woven fabric with a zip and slit at the back. Lined.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 90x110 cm.

Large scarf in an airy, patterned weave with a frayed, raw-edge hem. Size 158x210 cm.
Velour pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms. Top with ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-high slippers in faux fur with appliqués. Pile linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Baby Exclusive. Down all-in-one suit with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and diagonal zip that continues down one leg. Ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem and a contrasting colour lining. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.
Fitted jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with slits in the sides. Long, gently flared sleeves with knitted loops and slits and ties at the cuffs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, low crotch, and zip fly and button. Embroidery details at the top and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Trousers in a stretch cotton blend with wide ribbing at the waist for added comfort. Fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with pleats.
Hairband of braided imitation suede with decorative fabric flowers and elastic at the back of the neck.
Woven cotton blouse in a shorter style with a V-neck and concealed fastener at the front, low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs and wide, sewn-on ties at the waist.
